channel.title: Kicksecure 16.1.1.5 - for VirtualBox - Point Release!
channel.description:
# Kicksecure for VirtualBox
Download Kicksecure for VirtualBox:
https://www.kicksecure.com/wiki/VirtualBox
----
This is a point release.
https://www.kicksecure.com/wiki/Point_Release
----
# Major Changes
* add `fuse` to `kicksecure-default-applications-cli` because `fuse` is required when running `flatpak` as user, by appimages. https://forums.whonix.org/t/installation-of-monero-gui-from-flatpak-fails-without-sudo-su/16616/ * install xscreensaver by default by adding `xscreensaver` to `kicksecure-shared-host-xfce` https://forums.kicksecure.com/t/kicksecure-no-screen-lock-installed/221 * add torsocks to kicksecure-recommended-cli useful to download from onions using curl (such as Linux installers) * abolish architecture specific syscall whitelist to improve maintainability https://forums.kicksecure.com/t/sdwdate-failed-to-start-in-debian-12-bookworm-next-release/134/6 * apparmor fixes * vm.mmap_rnd_bits: Fix ppc64le Probably fixes a bunch of other non-x86_64 arches too. <ref> https://github.com/Kicksecure/security-misc/commit/61f63255acdf942e52af35d7f6d1c271a671e6f7 </ref> (Thanks to @JeremyRand) * derivative-maker: * more robust mount, umount, umount_kill.sh * work towards systemd-nspawn
----
# Upgrade
Alternatively, in-place release upgrade is possible upgrade using [Kicksecure repository](https://www.kicksecure.com/wiki/Project-APT-Repository).
----
This release would not have been possible without the numerous supporters of Kicksecure!
----
Please Donate!
https://www.kicksecure.com/wiki/Donate
----
Please Contribute!
https://www.kicksecure.com/wiki/Contribute
----
# Changelog
https://www.kicksecure.com/wiki/Stable_Release
----
# Full difference of all changes
https://github.com/Kicksecure/derivative-maker/compare/16.0.9.8-developers-only...16.1.1.5-developers-only

item.title: Kicksecure 16.1.1.5 - for VirtualBox - Point Release!
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Kicksecure for VirtualBox

Download Kicksecure for VirtualBox:

Kicksecure – 9 Jun 23

Kicksecure ™ for Windows, macOS, Linux inside VirtualBox

Getting started with Kicksecure ™ in 4 simple steps.

This is a point release.

Kicksecure – 7 Mar 23

Point Release

What is a Point Release?

Major Changes

  • add fuse to kicksecure-default-applications-cli because fuse is required when running flatpak as user, by appimages. installation of monero-gui from flatpak fails without sudo su - Support - Whonix Forum
  • install xscreensaver by default by adding xscreensaver to kicksecure-shared-host-xfce Kicksecure no screen lock installed
  • add torsocks to kicksecure-recommended-cli useful to download from onions using curl (such as Linux installers)
  • abolish architecture specific syscall whitelist to improve maintainability Sdwdate failed to start in debian 12 bookworm (next release) - #6 by Patrick
  • apparmor fixes
  • vm.mmap_rnd_bits: Fix ppc64le Probably fixes a bunch of other non-x86_64 arches too.
    vm.mmap_rnd_bits: Fix ppc64le · Kicksecure/security-misc@61f6325 · GitHub
    (Thanks to @JeremyRand)
  • derivative-maker:
    • more robust mount, umount, umount_kill.sh
    • work towards systemd-nspawn

Upgrade

Alternatively, in-place release upgrade is possible upgrade using Kicksecure repository.

This release would not have been possible without the numerous supporters of Kicksecure!

Please Donate!

Kicksecure – 25 Mar 23

Donating to Kicksecure ™

PayPal, Bitcoin (BTC), Monero (XMR), Ethereum (ETH) or Token, Credit Card, Bank Wire, Others

Please Contribute!

Kicksecure – 7 Jun 23

Contribute to Kicksecure

Spread, Follow, Develop, Testing, Donate. Contribute to Freedom Software / Open Source.

Changelog

Kicksecure – 17 Mar 23

Changelog
